title: Songzhi Liu
text: I am the operations manager for CoastWatch Great Lakes Node. I have been working on satellite data for over two decades. My work is mainly focused on how to transform satellite data into daily usage. I developed Great Lakes satellite data training and tutorial materials to help users better understand and utilize these products.

title: Songzhi Liu
text:
Areas of Expertise and Interest
*Satellite data acquisition and processing.
*Satellite data product development.
*Data server management.
*Satellite data training.

title: Songzhi Liu
text:
Experiences
*General Programmer/Analyst Lead (2019-present) | CIGLR SEAS University of Michigan
*General Programmer/Analyst Sr (2005-2019) | CIGLR SEAS University of Michigan
*Programmer Analyst I (1997-2005) | CILER University of Michigan

title: Songzhi Liu
text:
Education
*Master Degree in Computer Science, Eastern Michigan University (1997)
*Bachelor Degree in Engineering, Henan Polytechnic University (1981)
